Method Detail
<static> {String} Encoding.codeToString(data)
Joins a character code array to string.
Parameters:
{Array.|TypedArray} data
The data being joined.
Returns:
{String} The joined string.
<static> {Array} Encoding.convert(data, to, from)
Convert character encoding. If `from` is "AUTO", or the encoding-list as an array, or comma separated list string it will be detected automatically.
Parameters:
{Array.|TypedArray} data
The data being converted.
{(string|Object)} to
The name of encoding to.
{(string|Array.)=} from Optional
The encoding-list of character encoding.
Returns:
{Array} The converted array.
<static> {string|boolean} Encoding.detect(data, encodings)
Detects character encoding. If encodings is "AUTO", or the encoding-list as an array, or comma separated list string it will be detected automatically.
Parameters:
{Array.|TypedArray} data
The data being detected.
{(Object|string|Array.)=} encodings Optional
The encoding-list of character encoding.
Returns:
{string|boolean} The detected character encoding, or false.
<static> {Array.} Encoding.stringToCode(string)
Splits string to an array of character codes.
Parameters:
{string} string
The input string.
Returns:
{Array.} The character code array.
<static> {Array.} Encoding.urlDecode(string)
Decode a percent encoded string to character code array like decodeURIComponent.
Parameters:
{string} string
The data being decoded.
Returns:
{Array.} The decoded array.
<static> {string} Encoding.urlEncode(data)
Encode a character code array to URL string like encodeURIComponent.
Parameters:
{Array.|TypedArray} data
The data being encoded.
Returns:
{string} The percent encoded string.
